text: @KellyO @VP That is only Republican propaganda & scare tactics from the White House. Proven Facts: more than 3,660,200 people in the United States have been infected with the coronavirus and at least 139,186 have died. The Truth is: US citizens are NOT SAFE under the Trump Administration.
